entry.title: Sunday Becomes Hottest Day of 2025 So Far in Roseburg, Record Broken
entry.summary: Sunday hit 100°F in Roseburg, making it the hottest day of 2025 so far and breaking the June 8th record of 99°F set in 2015. Monday could bring another record, with a forecasted high of 98°F, surpassing the previous June 9th record of 94°F.

entry.title: Douglas County Enters 2025 Fire Season: What You Need to Know
entry.summary: Fire season is now in effect across the Douglas District. DFPA has set Public Use Restrictions to “Moderate” and Industrial Fire Precaution Level to 1. Campfires are limited, off-road driving is restricted, and chainsaw or mowing hours are now reduced to prevent wildfire risk.
